
======================
 Worlds of Darkness
       v0.62
 Elwynor Technologies
======================

This is really alpha, as it is an unfinished game. There are things planned
for this game that never made it into the game before the original developers
stopped working on the project. 

The game's features that do work are beta, and they seem to work well.
There are some known bugs.

We are offering this binary distribution to help the volunteers from
The Major BBS Restoration Project test and evolve the game. 

Come to the Major BBS discord server:
 https://discord.gg/Q3sCSPNw
 
And talk in the #elwynor or #worldsofdarkness channel

Thanks! 

Rick Hadsall
Elwynor Technologies
